021111.content:
Batgirl slowly came to in a strange room, and the only clue as to how was the dull pain in the back of her head. She had been investigating a disturbance in the factory district, when she was unexpectedly hit from behind, instantly falling unconscious on the hard ground. Her recollection of the prior events was suddenly interrupted, by the familiar sound of high pitched laughter piercing her ears. Of course it was her. It had been far too long since there had been any sightings of the psychotic harlequin. Sure enough, practically skipping through the doorway, was the obese clown herself, Harley Quinn. Ever since the mysterious phenomenon that had left the vast majority of Gotham City fat, the crazy villainess had managed to keep herself only moderately chubby, but that was no longer true. It had been months since Batgirl had last seen Harley, and she was stunned to see her new figure. Now, she could only be described as massive, in all definitions of the word.

She had always been a few inches taller than the heroine, but her new girth made her much more intimidating. Her face, still covered in heavy makeup, was almost completely round and included a noticeable double chin. Her plump red lips were in a wide smile, putting dimples in her full cheeks. She still maintained her signature blonde pigtails, with one side dyed red and the other black. Moving down her body, set a pair of ample breasts. Each was as large as a volleyball, and were barely contained by her low cut black and red halter top. Supporting her ponderous breasts, was a belly that was absolutely gigantic, causing her shirt to ride up completely. The immense pale belly stuck out farther than her chest, and hung down over her crotch. A pair of black and red booty shorts were stretched to the limit by her immense lower half. Each of her plump thighs were as big as Batgirl’s body, and made her shorts seem like they were painted on. Finally was her enormous, fleshy ass jutting out behind her, each cheek easily big enough to crush the heroine.

“Oh hey there Batgirl, looks like you’re finally up,” Harley giggled down at Batgirl. “The big bat would be so disappointed in how easy ya went down. What a joke ya are. Don’t worry though, I love jokes. Now come to mama!”

Harley was already standing above Batgirl, and was reaching her meaty hands toward the downed heroine. Before she could be grabbed, Batgirl slapped Harley’s arms away, and threw a kick at her enormous belly. Surveying her opponent, she was surprised to see that the obese clown was completely unfazed. Harley merely giggled and acted as if she was scratching an itch on her belly. Not to be deterred, she threw another kick at the huge pale belly, which was still jiggling from the previous blow, but there was still no effect. Harley’s already wide grin grew even wider, as she easily withstood the heroine’s pointless attacks. Several more kicks bounced effortlessly off of the rotund villain, and Batgirl slowly brought her assault to a stop.

Not one to give up easily, the frustrated hero clenched her fists, took a fighting stance and threw another kick. This time however, Harley swayed to the side, easily dodging the desperate roundhouse. Before Batgirl could even process her mistake, she was suddenly engulfed in fat, as Harley locked in a tight bear hug. The maneuver was unrelenting, brutally compressing the heroine’s ribs, completely robbing her of breath. The assault on her body only got worse, as Harley effortlessly threw the breathless hero against the nearest wall. First to hit was her back, knocking out the breath she had just got back, followed immediately by her head bouncing hard off the unforgiving surface. Batgirl staggered forward, her eyes glazed over, and gasping for breath. Her legs felt like jelly beneath her, and it was a struggle to even lift her arms to defend herself. Before she could even get herself back together, a meaty fist collided hard into the side of her head. The devastating blow sent Batgirl reeling to her right, and down to the floor, landing with a dull thud.

She was only down for a couple seconds, before she was pulled back to her feet by her long red hair. The dazed hero wanted nothing more than to fight back, but she wasn’t fully aware of what was happening. In fact, the only thing even holding her up, was the grip the enormous Harley had on her, who looked absolutely ecstatic with herself.

“Wow you really ain’t nothin', are ya?” Harley laughed, as she gave Batgirl a slap across the face. “I thought you’d put up some kinda fight. I’ve taken shits that were tougher than you!”

Batgirl winced in pain, unable to do anything but listen, as Harley continued to slap and berate her. She repeatedly yelped and gasped, as the slaps started coming harder and faster, quickly reddening what skin could be seen on her face. After a couple minutes of this, one last slap echoed through the room, as Harley finally allowed Batgirl to fall backwards onto the floor. The heroine tried to force herself up, but her body wasn’t having it.

“This is gettin’ kinda sad,” Harley pouted, nonchalantly kicking the downed Batgirl. “If ya ain’t gonna put up a fight, then what do I do with ya? I mean, I guess there’s other things we can do, huh. Or I could just let one of my girls play with ya. What should I do?”
021111.title: Batgirl VS Harley Quinn

choices: Tittilated, Harley takes Batgirl back to her private hideout.
Disturbed, Harley decides to finish Batgirl off once and for all.
0211111.content:
With her cheek stinging, head throbbing, and a near certainty that Harley had bruised her ribs with that last kick, Batgirl was nearing her physical limits. "Please. Please, Harley–stop this..." Struggling tremulously, the copper-haired heroine rolled onto her side and pushed herself up onto all fours, wiping a thin trickle of blood from the corner of her mouth. The room seemed to be spinning around her, and she wondered faintly if she might have suffered a minor concussion. An impairment like that would make her situation virtually untenable, already outclassed in weight as she was...

Harley's deep belly-laugh echoed off the walls of the industrial warehouse, jarring Batgirl from her thoughts, "You know, have-ta say I'm really disappointed in you, Batsy. A few limp-noodle kicks and you go down for the count? Disgraceful." Stepping forward heavily, the checker-clad butterball stretched out a porky hand and grabbed Batgirl by the hair again, pulling her up onto her knees. "You're s'posed-ta be some kinda 'phantom of the night', and yet here you are, puttin' up less of a fight than a wad o' lint..."

Through eyes blurred with welling tears, the disgraced Batgirl found herself staring at the pale wall of Harley's enormous, burgeoning gut. She was too weak to keep fighting, and she knew it. Whatever depravity Harley had in mind for her, she simply lacked the energy to fight her off. It was a humiliating realization. Years of training, honing her skills in hand-to-hand combat, only to be bested by this morbidly obese lunatic...

Harley's voice was steeped in a manic gleefulness as the villainess moved her hands to the back of Batgirl's head, "Matter-of-fact Batsy, speakin' of lint–think I know just where you belong..." Her scarlet-red lips curled into a wicked grin and Batgirl felt and icy pit form in her stomach. She knew she needed to escape, to flee and regroup, but where her will prevailed, her body had given out. With a rush, Harley plunged her innocent victim's head face-first into the soft, cushioned depths of her bellybutton. "Haha! Get it? You're like a useless little ball o' lint, Batsy!"

All at once, Batgirl found herself deeply engulfed in the musky, sweltering embrace of Harley's fattened navel. Cut off from light and air, her feet scrabbled against the concrete floor and she slapped and pushed against her captor's corpulent belly, to no avail. Harley's blobbish gut was thick with cushion-like fat and simply had too much give–with each shove, Batgirl's hands only sank uselessly into the blubbery flesh as she struggled frantically to free herself.

Satisfied with her prey's subdual, Harley moved her own hands to her flabby sides, squeezing and shaking her immense girth teasingly, "Haha! Look at you, Batsy, caught like a mouse in a trap! Pathetic." All the same, the neurotic clown was suddenly finding herself unexpectedly flushed with arousal at the sight of one of her greatest nemeses so helplessly under her control. As she stared down over her gut, watching the fat around her bellybutton flex outward as it held Batgirl in place, her pudgy hands slowly drifted up to her pillowy breasts where they strained against her halter top. Chewing her lip in excitement, she began distractedly teasing her nipples through the fabric, "Keep on struggling for me, Bats...that's good..." As Batgirl twisted and jerked spasmodically, Harley felt a familiar, hot, dampening in her booty shorts between her immense thighs.

The self-realization of her sexual desires toward Batgirl were cut short however, as the trapped heroine's lithe figure suddenly stilled, her arms ceasing their helpless struggling to fall limply at her sides. The smirk returned to Harley's face, "Aw, shucks, Batsy–silly me, I forgot you can't breathe in there, can ya? Here, lemme get you outta there, ya little human Q-tip, haha!"

Resting her sausage-fingered hands on Batgirl's shoulders, Harley gave a mighty push. Covered in greasy sweat, the unconscious hero's head slid free of its prison at last with a wet *pop*, leaving her to crumple to the floor like a ragdoll.

Not forgetting her unexpected lustfullness of moments prior, Harley's eyes traced their way along her overwhelmed foe's slender body, appreciating the delicate curves of her figure in a new light. When her gaze reached Batgirl's face, she cocked an eyebrow interestedly, "Well, would ya look at that! Unmasked at last!" Reaching down to pull her sagging gut upward, Harley fished a plump hand into her navel, digging for a moment before she withdrew the defeated heroine's mask. "Guess I must'a squeezed it right off of ya, haha!"

She tossed the matte-black covering over her shoulder lackadaisically to clatter across the floor, before casting a pondering look at her unconscious pet. "But what to do with you now, Batsy?"
0211111.title: Batgirl's Bellybutton Brutalization

0211112.content:
“Ya know what Batgirl,” Harley sighed. “I’ve actually got better things I could be doing right now. Like, literally anything else would be more fun.”

“This isn’t finished Harley,” Batgirl growled, forcing herself to stand. “I’m will be taking you in…”

“You’re right that things aren’t finished,” Harley interrupted, “But you won’t be dealing with me anymore. I’m gonna let one of my girls play with you instead.”

Batgirl looked confused for a second, but before she could question the crazy clown, she was interrupted by her yelling.

“GIGGLES, GET YOUR JIGGLY ASS IN HERE!” Harley yelled toward the door, with a huge grin on her face.

Batgirl watched in utter shock, as an absolutely massive figure squeezed her way through the doorway. This new woman actually made the blubbery Harley Quinn look small in comparison. If she had to guess, she was somewhere around 6’6” and easily 600+ pounds. Giggles look was clearly modeled after Harley’s, demonstrated by her two-tone pink and black hair, clown-like makeup, and her revealing pink and black outfit. An outfit which consisted of a low-cut tank top and shorts, both of which were woefully inadequate in covering her vast body. Her huge swollen breasts rested on top of a mountainous belly, which itself hung down to her incredibly plump thighs. Staring up at the behemoth henchwoman, Batgirl was very unnerved by the huge toothy grin on her face. She seemed way too happy to be here. Looking up at her massive underling, then down at Batgirl, Harley couldn’t stop herself from laughing. Just thinking about what the poor heroine was going to be put through and she almost felt sorry for her… Almost.

“Okay Giggles here’s the deal,” Harley said. “You’ve been doing real great lately, so I’m gonna give you a little reward. Until I tell you different, Batgirl here belongs to you. You can do anything you want with her, anything at all, understand ? Now, go have fun big girl!”

“Oh my god, thanks a ton, Boss,” Giggles practically squealed, bouncing up and down in excitement. “This is the best day of my life! I’m gonna have so much fun with Batgirl, I can’t wait!”

With that said, Harley gave Giggles an encouraging slap on the ass, and then skipped her way out of the room. As soon as the door closed, Batgirl lunged forward quickly, hoping to catch the behemoth thug off guard. In all honesty, it was a ridiculous move on her part, but she was in a desperate situation. Giggles however, wasn’t surprised in the least, and actually seemed excited that the hero was moving toward her. As could be expected, the massive woman was completely unaffected by the attempted tackle. Batgirl merely bounced off of her doughy belly and fell to the floor, her face twisted from the pain of the impact. Already in pain from her beatdown from Harley previously, she was helpless to stop herself from being easily lifted off of the ground. No sooner was she lifted, before she was effortlessly thrown back first into the wall, groaning and wincing in pain from the violent collision. Before she even knew what was coming, Giggles was already on her. Batgirl could only watch in horror, as the mass of jiggling fat crashed into her, sandwiching her smaller body between her flab and the wall. There was a loud grunt of pain, followed by all of the air leaving the heroine’s lungs. As Giggles stepped away, Batgirl’s limp body slid down along her big doughy belly, and collapsed face first on the floor.

“How was that Batgirl,” Giggles taunted, while laughing down at her. “Am I too much for you to handle? Too bad, we’re just getting started!”

Still grinning, Giggles merely lifted her meaty right foot up, and violently stomped right onto Batgirl’s back. The heroine’s back arched and she screamed out in pain, as she clawed at the ground, trying in vein to escape the merciless foot grinding into her spine. After several seconds of excruciating pain, the foot was removed. Without giving her a break, Giggles reached down and grabbed Batgirl by her hair. She was literally dragged behind the behemoth by her hair, with her limp body scraping along the ground. She was then lifted back up, and shoved roughly against the wall once again. Her entire body ached horribly, and simply she even standing upright was hard to do. Batgirl watched helplessly through blurry eyes, as Giggles wound up and threw a devastating slap across her face, snapping her head to the side. Another slap struck the opposite side, this time the heroine started to fall toward the floor. Before she could fall however, she was pulled back up by her hair, and held in place. Again and again the slaps stuck her face, Giggles enormous belly and breasts jiggling wildly throughout. Batgirl was practically out on her feet by this point, her body only being held up by the behemoth holding her by the hair. Growing bored of slapping the heroine around, Giggles released her grip on her hair, allowing Batgirl to fall in a heap on the floor. There she lay on her back, eyes clenched shut, twitching and groaning in pain.

As Giggles watched Batgirl’s pathetically beaten body twitch on the floor , she suddenly got a great idea. Grasping the overworked waistband of her shorts, she slowly peeled the skin-tight garment down her thick legs. The titanic thug wasn’t wearing any underwear, so her enormous jiggly ass was now fully exposed, looming over the heroine below her. Down on the ground, Batgirl had just managed to open her eyes, and she instantly wished she hadn’t. She watched in abject horror, as Giggles slapped her massive cheeks, causing the mass of fat to jiggle wildly.

“No, please...” Batgirl winced, trying in vain to will her body to move.

With no warning at all, Giggles actually managed to leap off of the ground slightly, and then her enormous ass immediately plummeted down towards Batgirl’s head. There was very audible thud, as hundreds of pounds of fat ass smashed down onto the heroine, directly onto her upturned face. The whole room seemed to shake, and Giggles entire massive body jiggled from the impact. All that could be seen of Batgirl under the mass of pale fat, were her frantically flailing limbs. It was an absolutely devastating move, and it was a miracle that the heroine was still conscious. Batgirl however, wasn’t finding anything miraculous about being buried under the mountain off ass fat. Giggles was in no hurry to move from her position, happily enjoying the feeling of the heroine’s panicked thrashing. Pushing and clawing at the massive ass cheeks was useless, only serving to shift the fat around her head. As if the humiliation and pain weren’t enough, her nose was being assaulted by the awful smell of ass sweat, and it was tainting what little air she could manage to breathe in. Above, Giggles was practically euphoric, as the squirming beneath her began to fade. After a few moments, Batgirl finally succumbed to the unbearable torment, actually welcoming unconsciousness.
0211112.title: Now The Property Of Harley’s Favorite Henchwoman

02112.content:
Life behind bars hadn't been overly harsh to Valerie, her size and power giving more than enough reason for the other inmates to keep on her good side. The guards and warden saw the gigantic woman in a similar way, letting her conduct business in a convenient blindspot of their authority. Once a brash, bright eyed and skinny thug trying to make her way under any villain Gotham had that would take her, Valerie had run across Batman. The hero had easily seen her brought to justice in the same fashion as her cellmates.. Though the greatest regret the now super sized thug has is that the Bat himself didn't even have to bother with her. Bested by his sidekick, a lithe and athletic young Batgirl, Valerie had a grudge she wished to revisit.

Prison didn't offer the rehabilitation and second chance it's intended to for the youthful thug. Instead Valerie found an atmosphere that let her deviousness thrive and her more selfish traits prosper. Gluttony was the most obvious of the woman's growing desires, with the transformation over her three year incarceration scarcely believed by anyone outside Gotham itself. And even then, it only seemed possible due to the entire city being plumped up almost overnight. She retained her dirty blonde hair, the mixture of golden and light brown strands stretching well beyond her shoulders and down to her waist when allowed to run free. The only physical trait that hadn't changed, alongside her bright sky blue eyes. The rest of Valerie's once statuesque figure had been softened and enlarged, the six foot seven frame now over twice her original weight.

When she'd first faced Batgirl she was merely one of a group of underlings trying to cover for their bosses escape. Her height was mixed with a more athletic build, subtley muscular within a partial hourglass silhouette. Now, Valerie was a very different woman. Her once ample chest was now truly massive, shoulders broader than in her more slender days with her once toned and defined arms now smothered in chubby white flesh. The firm facial features she'd once posessed had softened with time as well, her chin no longer pointed as starkly and her cheeks chubbier and fuller. A big mouth in both attitude and physique Valerie had always had a wide smile and plump lips, now more than ever to match the rest of her bloated body.

Back when she'd been an underling and her hourglass had caught a few eyes, the narrow waist was essential to her look. Now it was nothing but a distant memory, with Valerie's gut carrying a vast amount of her immense weight, sagging down over her belt and stretching her prison uniform well beyond capacity, turning the modest attire into a tube top as it's squashed beneath her massive breasts and the top of her flabby belly. 'Thunder thighs' isn't a strong enough term for the tree trunks that Valerie calls her legs, topped by a pair of hips wider even than her shoulders or belly, framing a truly enormous ass that sways with each step of her long legs. A change brought on by the gluttony and greed that festered from her defeat at the hands of Batgirl, at least in Valerie's mind.

So when opportunity arose due to a break out in her prison, the massive Valerie simply strolled through the broken wall and onto Gothams streets yet again. The Bat didn't arrive in time to stop her and the prison guards knew better than to try, thus the massive thug sauntered off into Gotham once again, very literally at large.
02112.title: Opportunity

021121.content:
The sirens wailing in the distance barely reach her ears as the titanic escapee struts down one of Gothams sidewalks. With the sun long set and only the streetlights to illuminate the city Valerie felt certain she'd be safe in the seedier parts of town, so that's where she'd headed. Sure, having someone in prison stripes (even if it was shrunk to a tube top and shorts on the massive blonde) walking around on the same night as a break out was bound to cause a few curious stares, but with what these people were getting up to the last thing they wanted was the cops on their doorstep.

A short walk through a familiar neighbourhood brought Val to her crew's old haunt, though predictably it had been long since sold and refurbished. Part of that billionaire Wayne's attempts to turn the city into something more reputable. A thought that earned a derisive snort from the supersized criminal, before marching to the door of the small corner shop. Predictably it had long since closed business for the day given the sign hanging in the window. Turning to the side and aiming her right hip at the lock, Valerie gives one huge hip bump to the wooden door and it's slammed open with a loud clatter of metal. Proud smirk filling her face she ducks her head to slip inside, alarm blaring to alert the authorities.

When a car pulled up outside, sirens blaring and squad lights lit, the door was still lying wide open with the wooden frame cracked and splintered around the now broken lock. Both policemen left their hands resting over the holsters of their weapons whilst approaching the premises, though the lack of lighting made it impossible to see the intruder without entering themselves. After a few minutes of deliberation the younger of the two sneaks inside, leaving the older cop to stand guard. Slowly creeping through the aisles of the shop, magazines and candy bars lining the shelves on either side, the brash cop quickens his pace to round the corner towards the counter. Spinning around and drawing his weapon he collides with something huge and soft, bouncing off Valerie's flabby belly and breasts, stumbling to find his balance. In a flash the pudgy hand of the plus sized burgular is latched onto the cop's throat, the other gripping his wrist and keeping him from pulling his gun from it's holster. With an eerily calm smile Val inspects the lawman in her clutches, offering him a small compliment:

"You're cute."

The casual remark is followed by the cop being hurled through the air, crashing back first into the unforgiving wall and crumpling to the floor behind the counter. The till had already been emptied and sat open above his head whilst Valerie strutted around the desk after her prey. Trying to right himself the cop rolls onto his back and reaches for his holster, only to find one huge, bare foot trodding on the back of his palm. The soft, chubby sole grazed his calloused hand with it's delightfully soft skin, before Valerie's disapproval was voiced after a small tut.

"Shouldn't have done that."

As she shifts her weight from her back foot to the one perched upon the man's hand each of his fingers is squashed and his knuckles strained. One by one they pop underneath Valerie's foot, earning squeals and screams of pain from the 'cute' cop as his fingers are pulverised and his hand crushed under the incredible weight of the voluptuous blonde. A noise certain to alert his partner at the door, but what could he even do to stop this monster of a woman?

"Oh, don't be dramatic. We're going to have some fun until the Bat or his little minion arrives, cutie. But if you can't handle that little bit of weight, I'm a tad worried how you'll hold up. Best hope they get here soon."

With that she lifts her foot from the ground, the entirety of Valerie's weight now compressing the cops hand into the ground. She turns on his knuckles, stepping her other soft sole down onto his knee and giving it the same unrelenting pressure that snapped his fingers in a manner of seconds, before heading to the door to deal with his partner.
021121.title: Setting the trap

0211212.content:
It should be routine. Head over there now and find out what happened, only engage the suspect if you're certain you can apprehend them safely, then meet me at the prison to get the details on the escape.

Simple instructions, Batgirl surmised, as she stalked across the rooftops of the cities less impressive neighbourhoods. Grappling gun in hand she zips over the gaps between buildings with ease, red hair fluttering in the night sky beneath her cowl and above her cape. Taking a knee across the road from the small corner shop, she surveys the scene with little to be gleaned from the vantage point.

GPD car outside, but where are the officers?

Sighing to herself the heroine leaps from her perch, arms extended and cape spread like wings, gliding down to the abandoned GPD car. Her landing was smooth, crouched down and letting the cloak billow around her form, only to rise to her full height and allow herself a small smirk. Her mimicking of Batman's more brooding demeanour came to an end as she slipped around the side of the shop, seeking another entrance rather than risk the kicked in door. Thankfully a narrow window had been left on the latch, likely leading to a bathroom given the position at the back of the building. A few seconds of lockpicking later and Batgirl has the window open as wide as it can go, squeezing her curvy figure through it and climbing down quietly onto the porcelain throne beneath. Just as she'd suspected, she found herself in the staff toilet of the small business, the grey wall tiles and murky sink hinting maybe it's not the most well kept establishment.

Peering through the small gap in the ajar door, Batgirl gives herself a chance to spy whatever the hallway outside may hide. A noticeboard between the bathroom and the next door up is littered with small pamphelts and notes, an 'I hate mondays' cat poster hanging on the opposite wall. At the far end the door to the shop floor is still shut, though there's a light on in the office next to the poster, with the door sitting half open. Sneaking through the shadows of the barely lit shop, Batgirl edges closer to the open door with her ears perked and her guard raised. A few small noises can be heard from inside though nothing clear enough to discern who is to blame. Squatting down as she reaches the door, the heroine leans forward to get a glimpse of the office through the doorway. The light is coming from a small desk lamp on the table in the centre of the tiny room, with a man tapped to the brown leather chair. The GPD badge sticks out above the tape wrapped five times around his torso and arms, with another strip covering his lips. It appears the noises Batgirl heard were his limited attempts at escape.

Glancing up the hallway to the door to the shop floor, Batgirl is now able to spot the store room on the same wall as the bathroom. Another door that's actually open.
0211212.title: Breaking and Entering

02112122.content:
Leaving the office for now Batgirl quickly skulks up the hallway to the store. Back flat against the wall she once again peers inside, though this time with much more success. The sounds of someone rummaging through boxes is impossible to miss, with the occasional grunt of disapproval or frustrated curse word being uttered beneath their breath. The bulb hanging from the ceiling lights the room fully, a stark contrast to the rest of the building, with the roof high shelves lining the walls of the narrow room.

"Ugh! Stupid bloody shop..."

A womans voice rings out as the loud clatter of a dropped box rings through the store, followed by heavy footsteps. Heavy footsteps that are quickly getting closer to the door. With little other option Batgirl readies herself to ambush the would-be thief, timing her kick with the encroaching thud of her foes stride. When the door is pushed back against the wall of the store Batgirl launches herself into action, spinning around the doorframe and landing her boot straight into the gut of her target.

The give in Valerie's bloated tummy is instantly felt beneath the heroine's foot, the force of her kick sinking her sole into the mass of jiggly white fat and completely messing with her calculations. Instead of pushing herself off her adversary at the precipise of her kick, instead the heroine's momentum slows more gradually, seeing her tumble onto her hip and elbow on the ground before the mammoth blonde. Moving one pudgy hand to her kicked belly, Valerie glares down at the prone heroine, bellowing angrily before lunging at Batgirl.

"You!"

The irate blonde hurls herself forward, hands grasping for Batgirl only to find the slender heroine far too swift. Rolling to the side and back on her feet in a flash, the crime fighting redhead raises her hands ready to box, bouncing on the balls of her feet and sizing up her opponent. An appraisal that immediately leaves her feeling outmatched. Valerie stumbles out into the hallway and turns to face the swifter, smaller woman, glaring daggers through those beautiful blue eyes. Round two starts as quickly as round one had, though this time it's Valerie on the offensive. Her massive frame doesn't offer much mobility in the cramped corridor, with her pawing and punching easily evaded by each of Batgirl's weaving movements. The heroine backs away with small steps each time Valerie swings and misses, eventually replying with a quick jab towards the blonde's cheek. The blow lands flush but barely seems to phase the massive brawler, leaving Batgirl to continue backing up and weaving between the lumbering movements of the vengeful Valerie. The flurry of unsuccessful blows had little effect on the well trained heroine, but it did manage to keep Batgirls focus entirely. Less aware than she should be of her surroundings Batgirl finds herself being cornered at the end of the hallway far sooner than she'd imagined, though only realises as her heel clips a stack of papers piled in the corner for throwing away. Balance lost she catches herself by spreading her arms and pressing her shoulderblades against the wall at her back, looking back up just in time to see her obese blonde attacker quite literally on top of her.

As Batgirl stumbled Valerie pounced, pushing her arms out to catch herself on the wall as her vast body crashes against it with the heroine precariously positioned between brick and belly. The mass of smooth, white flesh crashes into Batgirl like a wave, her entire face engulfed in fat as Valerie lands with a meaty slap against the brick wall at the heroines back. With her air supply cut off immediately Batgirl finds the compressing of her chest that much more dangerous, the size of Valerie's gut dwarfing the heroine and smothering her face and breasts with ease beneath her. The oppressive weight squashing her against the wall presses her chest flat, driving what little air she had straight out of the heroine's lungs through the tiny space left around her mouth and nose. Instinctively parting her lips to suck in more air all Batgirl finds is flesh, her mouth filled with the sweaty fat of her attacker's belly whilst the massive weight behind it keeps her pinned in place, barely able to even turn her head to try and find air. Gloved hands claw and pry at the sides of Valerie's frame without success, pushing a woman of her size away an impossible feat with strength alone.

The smothering comes to an end much quicker than Batgirl had imagined, as Valerie pulls back just enough to hear the sound of the heroine filling her lungs with a desperate gasp for air. Reaching down to grab a hold of the heroine's hair Val yanks her back up against the wall, before hammering her clenched fist straight into the smaller woman's stomach. The air Batgirl had just regained was immediately sent out of her in a rasping cough, doubled over in the massive blonde's grasp with her arms defensively clutching her own abdomen. Another tug on the heroine's lovely red hair pulls her back to the wall again, this time closer to her full height before Valerie closes the gap again.

Batgirl's entire silhouette is swallowed beneath the supersized blonde, her breasts engulfing the heroine's face up to her cheeks, whilst her shapely chest and toned abs are crushed by the fat, sweaty belly of the overweight thug. Her arms are pinned between them in the process as her legs kick feebly against the wall and ground, wide eyes staring up at the pretty face of her unknown attacker. Once again Batgirl finds her attempts to breathe in snuffed out by the plumpness of Valerie's body, though this time thanks to her vast cleavage rather than her belly. The thug meets the heroine's gaze gleefully as victory seems assured, smile only growing as panic and fear begin to win out over the practiced, stoic stare of the superheroine at her mercy.
02112122.title: What lies in Store

021121221.content:
With Batgirl squirming and struggling under her weight Valerie gradually begins to relax, familiarity with the role winning out over her anger at seeing the heroine. After all, she wasn't the first person to be overwhelmed by the size of the voluptuous blonde. So whilst this suffocating, crushing weight may be new and terrifying for Batgirl, feeling a smaller, lither body struggle and fight beneath her dominating size made Val's victory feel real. Slowly she releases her hold on the heroines red hair, dragging her hand out from behind her head and resting it on the wall instead. The bricks now supporting the back of her head in place of the soft, pudgy hand makes Batgirl wince slightly as Val keeps herself pressed against the heroine, her predatory smirk now wide enough to show off her teeth.

"You don't even remember me, do you?"

Valerie asks calmly, letting her hands glide up the wall to lazily clasp together above Batgirl's head. Her elbows and forearms now support the majority of her weight, whilst she keeps the heroine struggling for air beneath only a fraction of her true size.

"You put me away, Batgirl. Back when I was a skinny little thing like you."

The revelation seems to be lost on the heroine, far too fixated on her current predicament to really grasp what Valerie is trying to tell her. She continues to try and turn beneath the oppresive weight of the fat criminal, turning her hips and wiggling her shoulders, tugging her arms this way and that only to find the supple, soft flab yielding against her efforts. Just enough to stifle any momentum before putting her back in place with the immense size behind each chubby roll. Pushing her perky ass against the wall and arching her back the barest amount Batgirl finally manages to tug one arm free, subsequently giving enough space for the other to follow suit. Her first thought is to reach for her utility belt, but it's impossible to get her hands to it with how closely Valerie's massive gut is squashed around her lithe waist. Cut off from her gadgets by the much larger lady, with air now utterly gone, panic begins to set in and her gloved hands push with all their might against the massive blonde's frame. She paws at her belly and slaps her sides, cupping her immense breasts and trying to pry them apart to grant herself air, yet every attempt is snuffed out without a hint of effort on the part of her attacker, Batgirl's struggles utterly futile in the face of such overwhelming, dominating fat. And then, a flood of air fills her lungs as the weight is lifted from her chest. The heroine sucks in every ounce of oxygen she can muster, feeling her compressed lungs inflate freely once again whilst still staring into the smirking face of Valerie. The huge criminal took a halfstep back, granting Batgirl freedom to breathe for a fraction of a second before pushing forward once again. Enough time for a breath to sustain her, but nowhere near a window of escape. The cry of fear that Batgirl lets out is turned into a muffled squeal in the depths of creamy white cleavage, her expression beneath the cowl swallowed in the mass of Valerie's bosom as her belly yet again compresses the heroine's torso.

"Shhh shh shh, we don't want you squealing yet, little 'hero'."

Valerie states with mockery dripping from every syllable. Casually letting a little of her weight off the trapped heroine, Val begins to bounce herself against the wall. Each push forward forces more of her weight against Batgirl than the first smother session, the heroine's compressed lungs being sandwiched thinner and thinner between fat and brick with each jiggly bounce of Val's monumental body. The added pressure of Val's playfulness means the breath Batgirl did manage lasts a fraction of the time the first one did, her clawing and squirming for air turning frantic in a matter of seconds. This time there's no reprieve, with Val instead continuing to casually bounce her fat against the trapped and suffocating redhead. Little muffled groans can be heard from the depths of the criminal's cleavage as Batgirl tries to plead for air, each passing moment turning her vision blurrier and making her struggles that little bit weaker. Her hands grip tightly onto each of Valerie's pudgy arms as she aims to pull the fat woman off of her, with her hold lessening quickly as Batgirl's eyes begin to roll. Just as her left hand falls limply to her side Valerie steps back, giving the heroine the chance to instinctively breathe in, rescuing her from the brink of unconsciousness. Crumpling in a heap to her knees before Valerie, Batgirl lands face first on her fat gut, the slap of skin on skin earning an amused giggle from the titanic blonde.

"Tired already? How did I ever let a little whimp like you get the better of me?"

Pushing herself off the wall Valerie stands on her own two feet again, reaching down to grasp Batgirl's hair in one hand. She peels the heroine off her belly with ease, letting her sway on her knees before the massive blonde before slapping her harshly across the face with her free hand. The force behind it stings Batgirl's skin harshly, reddening her cheek and causing her eyes to water. Looking back up at Valerie after the first slap she's greeted with a second with the back of the woman's hand, slapping the other side of her face with just as much strength as the first. A third and fourth follow in quick succession with Batgirl feebly raising her tired hands to try and cover her face. An act that earns revulsion from the towering Valerie, who releases the heroine's hair and raises her foot instead. The smooth skin of Valerie's sole presses against Batgirl's collar as the kneeling heroine reels from the unusual assault, finding herself toppled onto her back with a swift stomp by the overwhelming blonde. Crushed down to the base of the wall with her head jarred at an awkward angle Batgirl gazes up at the huge silhouette of her attacker, the limited light of the corridor making Valerie seem even more imposing as she blocks it out.

"I should squash you here and now instead of wasting my time."

She remarks coldly, beginning to lean forward and increase the pressure on Batgirl's collar. The heroine squirms in a bid for freedom only to succeed in lying flat on the ground now, at least saving her neck from the awkward jarring if nothing else. Pain begins to rise in Batgirl's shoulder and chest thanks to Val's meaty sole continuing to press down against her, gradually ramping up the weight in a relentlessly slow pace. Rather than stomping and cracking the girl's bones, the squasher deliberately chooses a more methodical and calculated approach. The reward is far sweeter in Val's mind, watching as panic sets in, the confidence Gotham's heroes prided themselves on being melted away under her weight. And Batgirl lived up to her expectations, still clawing at her ankle and trying to lift her foot despite the proof she isn't strong enough to lift Valerie throughout their fight. But even that stubbornness has a limit, and when the pain begins to manifest in squeals and screams, as the bone is sandwiched underfoot with Batgirl's athletic muscles being crushed and flattened by superior fat, the defiance in her eyes is outdone by fear once again.
021121221.title: Smother knows best

choices: Heroes don't lose to common thugs, fight back!
0211212211.content:
As the seconds draw on Valerie begins to lean forward. Her massive frame bends down, lowering her face closer to Batgirls and compounding the immense pressure from that fat foot on top of the heroine's collar. With both of her hands pushing with all her might against the pudgy ankle of her attacker Batgirl grits her teeth and grimaces in pain, her shoulder and collarbone being squashed flatter with each stubborn moment she bites her tongue and squirms for freedom. A sharp, stinging sensation tingles along the length of her shoulder a fraction of a second before Valerie lifts her foot, just barely soon enough to stop the heroine's bone from breaking.

"Or..."

Valerie's smirk was wider than ever as she stepped back off the battered vigilante.

"... I could beat you again."

With astonishment widening her eyes Batgirl hesitantly rises to her feet. Her shoulder remains numb with pins and needles running through her arm thanks to the brutal crushing under Valerie's foot, whilst the brief smothering has left her fatigued. Regardless the pride in the redheaded heroine demands she rise to the challenge, lifting her fists to ready herself once again. There's very little room on either side of the voluptuous blonde in that narrow hallway. No way to slip past and thus no real option other than to fight head on. After Dragging out the stand off as long as she can to try and catch her breath, Batgirl eventually springs off the wall and towards her opponent. Leaping up towards the much larger lady she swings an uppercut for Valerie's chin though finds nothing but air by the time she's reached the peek of her jump. Her movements were sluggish thanks to the beating she'd already received, leaving Valerie with plenty of time to maneuver her bulky frame back a step and lean out of the line of fire. Before she lands from her failed uppercut Batgirl is caught in the obese thug's grasp yet again, one flabby arm wrapping itself around the back of her head and pulling her in close.

The familiar warmth and softness of Valerie's fat engulfs Batgirls face as she's tugged straight into the meaty pit of the supersized blonde. Plump arm wrapped around the vigilante's head to hold her in place, Val begins to giggle in amusement as the knuckles of her other hand dig into the top of the heroine's cowl covered head. Whilst the humiliation of such a grade school 'attack' was hard to ignore Batgirl found breathing a more immediate issue yet again. Her efforts to escape see her hands pressed firm to the rotund belly of the massive thug, doughy physique molding and kneading under her palms in refusal to give her any true grip of escape.

"It's like you aren't even trying. Maybe you enjoy getting bullied by a bigger gal, huh?"

Valerie taunts with that same lascivious smirk spread across her full lips. Just as the lack of air begins to drift into the dangerous she releases Batgirl's head, lifting her arm and letting the redhead push herself backwards with full force. Not expecting to be released, the heroine put everything she had into her escape, causing her to overbalance and end up on her shapely butt in front of the massive blonde yet again. With a mixture of her own sweat and Valeries now giving the revealed jawline of the heroine a glisten in the limited light of the hall, she bites back a frustrated snarl whilst clambering back up to her vertical base. Once more the heroine valiantly charges at her attacker. And once more Valerie easily overpowers and embarrasses her. First by blocking a roundhouse kick with her pudgy forearm, gripping Batgirl by her leg and hurling her against the wall with a thud echoing around the hall upon impact. The next attack doesn't even require a defense, the lethargy of the battered heroine sapping her strength and speed. As she lunges at Valerie and swings her fist towards the blonde's huge belly all she manages to do is jiggle the creamy gut, knuckles sinking harmlessly into the almost endless plumpness of the supersized thug. In response that mass of flab thrusts against Batgirl and sends her back into the wall yet again, each failed attack on the increasingly confident Valerie seeing her step forward and shorten the distance between the two and the back wall of the corridor.

"Tell you what, Batgirl. If you beg me really sweetly maybe I'll just keep you as a pet instead."

The very suggestion that she'd beg rekindles the pride in Batgirls chest. Once again she pushes herself to her feet before throwing herself in a desperate attack at Valerie. This time however the towering blonde doesn't wait for the heroine to act, snatching her out of the air like a wayward leaf carried in the breeze. A choked rasp bubbles from Batgirls lips as she tries to inhale, her throat clamped tight in one of Valeries chubby hands whilst the other grips the buckle of the heroine's utility belt. Shoving her back against the wall Valerie keeps her pinned there by her neck, the heel of her palm throttling the heroine whilst her feet kick helplessly a foot or so above the ground.

"You didn't even try and use this, so I guess you don't want it anymore."

Valerie remarks teasingly before pulling on the buckle and causing a loud snap to be heard. A few beads and vials from the belt clatter to the floor beneath the dangling heroine as Valerie tosses the broken belt behind her.

"Since you don't want to kiss my ass verbally."

Valerie begins as she releases her choke hold on the heroine, letting Batgirl crumple to her knees at the base of the wall again. Rubbing her neck gingerly with her gloved hand the heroine stares up at the supersized blonde as she continues to lay out her terms, having turned her back to Batgirl. Her hands rest on each massive hip as she struts up the corridor towards the utility belt, each step seeing that gigantic ass sway like a pendulum before the redheads eyes. Val stops just shy of crunching the utility belt under her foot, heel resting beneath the clasp and her toes raised in the air with the golden bat symbol saved only until she flattens her foot. Not even bothering to look at Batgirl, Valerie stares down at the belt as she completes her offer.

"Crawl over here and do it literally."

The statement gives Batgirl a moment of pause, sitting more upright and lifting her gaze to seek out Valerie's face, half believing the massive villain to be joking. Upon realising she's out of the thugs eye line her mind races for a way out, a small glance from the corner of her eye showing that she's by the bathroom door, the window still ajar from her entrance earlier in the night. Fatigue making her limbs burn and her muscles tingle makes the simple journey seem far more daunting, though as Batgirl looks towards the humongous ass of her attacker it's certainly the less intimidating of the two options. The sound of metal and plastic crunching breaks Batgirl back to the severity of her situation, with Valerie lowering her foot and demolishing the bat symbol of her utility belt with her monstrous weight. Grinding the ball of her foot down with little rotations of her heel Valerie crushes the badge into dust beneath her, a patronising tut accompanying the feeling of concrete unhindered beneath her sole yet again, with the rest of the belts links and gadgets strewn around her fat ankle.

"Or we can see if you're more durable than your silly little belt. Your choice."
0211212211.title: Round Two: Fight or Flight

choices: Valerie won't give her up that easily
02112122111.content:
Choice wasn't something Batgirl felt she'd been afforded in this situation. Staring at the massive blonde crunching her best chance at victory beneath her heel, the hero's fatigued body seems to grow heavier as hope ebbs from her. Briefly ceasing her panting to wet her lips the taste of Valerie's skin remains on her tongue, the tinge of salt from the more than plus sized attacker's sweat keeping the memory of being engulfed in fat fresh in the heroine's mind. Thankfully, the discipline her mentor is famous for kicks in through his redhaired protégé, with Batgirl returning to her silent search for escape. Her eyes travel down Valeries tall frame, along the rolls of her flabby waist and monstrous curves of her hips. As if on cue, when Batgirls eyes linger on that heart-shaped rear the thug clears her throat, a blatant sign of her patience wearing thin. Rather than tempt fate the heroine begins to crawl.

Peeling herself off the wall Batgirl places her hand onto the ground before her. Sitting with her legs splayed and her perky butt supporting the majority of her weight in her battered state, the heat and tightness of her muscles races up her arm as she begins to lean onto it. The heroine nearly stumbles at the first hurdle, though thrusts her second hand down to catch herself just in time. Too tired to even lift her head and still sucking in desperately ragged breaths to try and refill her formerly smothered lungs, the lilting, melodic giggle of her tormentor sees Batgirl hang her head lower with shame and humiliation tainting every thought. Slowly she claws her way across the corridor towards Valerie, her leather kneepads and padded gloves scratching quietly against the stone from the laziness of her movements.

The window. My grappling hook. Four steps back to the wall.

Three facts that stuck out through the haze of Batgirls hastily laid plans, counting her limited movement through the tired crawling towards Valerie. Just to the right of the blondes crushing foot lay her grappling gun latched to the tattered remains of her belt. Within touching distance, so long as Valerie didn't grab her immediately.

Placate her.

The very thought made the embarrassment of her situation flare back to prominence in the heroines mind, a wince twisting her pretty face beneath the black cowl of her vigilante alter ego. But once she arrives at Valeries heels the wisdom in the humiliating thought becomes far more obvious. On her hands and knees, staring straight up at the gigantic hips and ass blocking out the world beyond, Batgirl felt a pang of fear in her chest yet again. Butterflies flying in her stomach she tentatively sits back on her feet, lifting her left hand from the ground and letting it delicately caress the revealed skin of Valerie's leg. The leather of her glove dulls the sensation of the skin itself, but the sight and feeling of the thugs massive thunderthigh dimpling and molding beneath each slender fingertip threatens to enthrall the heroine there and then. As she sits up straight Batgirl's hand traverses along the outskirts of Valerie's thigh, fingers coiling around the side of her gigantic leg and letting the heroine take a real handful of that flabby figure. Meanwhile, as subtley as she can muster, Batgirl's right remains busy with her tattered belt. Undoing the clasp of her grappling hook as silently as the mechanism allows.

Above the cunning heroine Valerie revels in her victory. A broad and proud smirk filling her face, full lips spread wide and the occasional little laugh bubbling from between them. Her hands come to rest on the curve of each hip as she allows Batgirl time to 'submit', still ignorant to the vigilantes fumbling by her ankle. The gloved touch of the redhead rises further up Valeries long leg, eventually teasing the tips of her fingers along the bottom of her fat asscheek. Cupping as much of the overwhelming buttock in her dainty palm Batgirl finally unclips the grappling hook, glancing up to make sure Valerie's not looking her way.

"I didn't ask you to grope me, 'hero'. I said kiss. My. Ass."

With the handle of her grappling hook grasped tight in her right hand, the soft, smooth cheek of Valerie's ass in the other, Batgirl prepares her escape. She lifts off her perky rear and onto her toes whilst knelt behind the obese blonde, gripping her ass tighter to steady herself as she shifts her weight. Her fingers knead and massage Valerie's fat rear as she continues to prepare, staring the fat thug straight in the ass. Once again the need to wet her lips arises and as always it's accompanied by a refreshing of Valerie's taste. The little tinge of salt from her sweat, the memory of the overwhelming weight and flab robbing her of air and grinding her muscles and bones against the ground. How alluringly soft it felt in her hand right now...

The final addition to a familiar train of thought for the night gave Batgirl a more than slight shock. Her touch ceased to squeeze and knead Valerie's fat ass, the vigilante frozen in the wake of her own internal monologue. A clearing of the towering BBWs throat breaks the bewilderment of the heroine, with Batgirl leaning in and placing her lips against the smooth skin of Valerie's heavy asscheek. The heat of the blonde radiates against her face as Batgirl lets her kiss linger for a couple of seconds, resisting the urge to lean into the pillowy softness of that gigantic, devastatingly heavy rear. Instead, she parts her lips from Valeries cheek and immediately springs from her kneeling position, dashing towards the end of the corridor with every ounce of energy her weary body can muster. Clattering clumsily against the wall the heroine can hear the mocking laughter has stopped, accompanied instead by a disapproving tut from the titanic blonde no doubt lumbering after her. Extending her arm to fire off the hook of her grappling gun it flies through the open window that she'd used to enter the building so long ago, finding purchase in the opposite wall. Far from the sleek departure she'd planned, but Batgirl limply rolls through the narrow opening before Valerie can catch up.
02112122111.title: Delaying the Inevitable

choices: A good nights sleep (Skip forward and keep following Batgirl)
021121221111.content:
Tired panting sending little puffs of misty breath into the cold air above her, Batgirl remains flat on her back at the edge of the four story rooftop. She couldn't truly estimate how long she'd been hiding here, her encounter with Valerie still vividly imprinted on her mind and body despite the sun beginning to rise in the distance. As the first golden rays make their way over the stone lip of the rooftop, their heat warming the weary heroines face, Batgirl finally struggles up to a sitting position. With her back against the raised edge of the building she stares down at her beltless midriff, running her hand along her collar gingerly to test the lasting pain from Valeries crushing stomp.An entire night had passed and still the butterflies were there, rummaging around in her stomach whilst her chest tightened in fear at the thought of facing the massive thug again.

Fear, only fear, Batgirl told herself repeatedly.

Making it to her feet and pushing such thoughts as far into the back of her mind as she can, the redheaded heroine begins the long trek home, the spring in her step and playful confidence from the beginning of her patrol replaced with a humble and timid slouch. She'd only made it back through her bedroom window a few seconds before her spare communicator begin blinking, illuminating the dresser in the corner of her otherwise pitch black room. Plucking the small gadget from it's resting place Batgirl sighs irritably, just one of the many things she lost when her belt was shattered.

The conversation wasn't as brief as Batgirl would've liked, nor as sparse on the details of her evening. Methodically her mentor combed through her story to ensure exactly why she'd been out of contact for so long, why she'd never arrived to assist him with the break-out. It's almost as if he didn't believe she'd found no one at the address when she arrived.

Collapsing onto her bed once Batman had finally been satisfied with her explanation, Barbara left her costume in a heap beneath her bed. Face down in her pillow the nights events replay in sporatic clips through her minds eye, with question after question being raised and no answer to be found.

Why did I lose? Was she stronger, faster than me, or did I make a mistake?
Why did I lie to Batman? I should've told him what really happened.
Why did I kiss her butt...?

A frustrated groan sees Barbara kick her feet against the end of her mattress, arms gathering her pillow in a tight hug as she shakes her head into it. Sunlight peeking through the small gaps in her curtains and blinds isn't enough to stop the redhead from grabbing some desperately needed sleep, the more undisturbed the better.
021121221111.title: Walk of Shame

0211212211111.content:
Batgirl made it almost six days before running into another solo mission after that fateful first meeting with Valerie. Almost long enough to reassure Batman that nothing untoward had taken place. The GPD had found their two missing cops off site later in the week, neither of them having lived to tell the tale of Valeries reckless domination. Certainly a tragic state of affairs but one that afforded Batgirl a chance to keep her dirty big, blonde secret from the rest of the city. She'd helped Batman return a couple of the more notable escapees to prison and even foiled a Penguin plot without her mentors aid. Everything seemed to be going her way again, until that sixth afternoon.

Just after midday the alert went out. One of Gothams most renowned jewelry stores was being targetted by an opportunistic street gang. Theft was on the rise ever since the breakout took place, the criminal underworld taking advantage of the lacking manpower Batman and his allies had at their disposal. GPD were at least another ten minutes away by the time Batgirl arrived on the scene, with Batman and Nightwing both already occupied in other corners of Gotham. Learning from her mistakes Batgirl keeps her ego in check this time, scouting out the store from the rooftops above. Thankfully the artsy design of the establishment boasted a full glass front wall, making it easy for the heroine to survey the ongoing crime. Five thugs interspersed among the two civilian customers and three employees. Four of them armed with clubs and batons, with the fifth - obviously the leader - wielding a small handgun, currently pointed to the head of one of the employees. The door to the safe room at the back of the shop front lies wide open. With the sun high in the sky there were few options for cover in a sneaky approach, so Batgirl pops open one of the capsules on her spare utility belt and tips three pellets into her palm.

Dropping down into the alleyway alongside her former perch Batgirl slinks behind the parked cars on the street. Thankfully, common sense dictated the citizens stopped driving past even without GPD setting up a perimeter, so hurrying across the road proved easy as soon as the thugs guarding the door provided a blind spot. Taking a few deep breaths to steady her nerves the heroine readies her grappling gun in her free hand. Watching from the mirror of the car she's crouched beside, the moment the guard turns his head again she springs into action. A flurry of black leather and red hair streaks over the bonnet of the blue sports car, the pellets flung through the smashed glass door - no doubt shattered during the thugs assault - bursting in the jewelry shop and swiftly filling it with smoke. Confusion runs rampant as the lithe heroine slips into the cloud with a mask lifted to keep her breath untainted, an elbow to the gut driving one thug to the ground before a roundhouse kick smacks her heel against the back of his companions skull. Kicking the discarded club out of reach Batgirl unlatches a pair of steel cuffs from a compartment on her belt, fully completing the pirouette of her kick only to clasp one side around the previously elbowed thugs wrist, the other trapping him to the steel doorframe.

Coughing and yelling covers the pained groans of her first two victims as Batgirl stalks through the smoke. She takes a previously planned path along the edge of the shop and finds the third criminal with his back against the wall, both hands holding tight to his chosen weapon. A wooden baseball bat. Breaking into a small sprint Batgirl closes the last few feet between her and the baseball enthusiast, slipping beneath his guard and gripping one arm across her shoulder. Pivoting on her right foot and thrusting her shapely backside towards the thug, she yanks his arm forward and sends the criminal hurtling over her, colliding harshly back first on the concrete floor. Keeping a grip on his wrist Batgirl torques it to instinctively cause the thug to roll onto his stomach, binding his wrists with cable ties before tossing the wooden bat against the wall. A fourth smoke pellet is plucked from her belt as she vaults over the counter at the back of the shop front, gripping the barrel of the handgun wielded by the groups leader in her other hand. She pushes it upwards just as the startled criminal pulls the trigger, the gunshot prompting every civilian left in the cloud to panic and flee the scene. The bullet impacts harmlessly in the ceiling before Batgirls forearm smashes the gunmans nose, his colourful cursing lasting only a few seconds before she slams the back of his head against the wall. The impact loosens the thugs grip on his pistol, letting the heroine disarm him with ease and smack the butt of his gun against the thugs cheek, knocking him unconscious. As he slumps to the floor the original pellets smokescreen begins to lift, giving a glimpse of Batgirl to the remaining thug. Weapon raised above his head he lets out an enraged roar at the redhead, crossing the room as quickly as he can.

The fourth pellet Batgirl had withdrawn smacks the ground at his feet in the middle of the open vault door, stopping the thug dead in his tracks as he coughs and splutters. Weaving to the side Batgirl lashes out with a straight front kick to his kidney, crumpling the thug in one blow and sending him toppling into the vault. Rolling across the floor he doesn't halt until he crashes into the wall, whimpering quietly as he clutches his battered side. Stepping through the threshold the smoke ebbs in behind her, giving Batgirls reveal a fittingly intimidating aura as the thug stares fearfully up at her.

"The middle of the day, really? You thugs need to smarten up."

The redhead remarks with a playful smile, reaching down to roll the last man onto his stomach and place a knee against his shoulderblades. The second - and last - pair of cuffs from her belt are used this time, binding his wrists before she hauls him back into the smokey entrance. Dropping him alongside his unconscious leader, Batgirl steps into the vault again to check for the missing wares. No sooner had her boot hit the floor outside the smokescreen than a pudgy hand grabbed hold of Batgirls throat, stifling the air from the masked redhead and dragging her up into the air, face to face with the sixth and previously unseen member of the robbery. Staring into the beautiful blue eyes of a far too familiar face, Batgirl claws at Valeries plump fingers to try and loosen the chokehold on her slender neck.

"Thanks for that, Batgirl. I didn't want to split the loot anyway."

With incredible force the heroine finds herself thrown from Valeries hand, crashing back first into the wall of the vault with such impact her knees shook when she landed on her feet. The wobbly stance sees the redhead reach for the wall to steady herself, sucking in a few lungfuls of air to enjoy the newfound freedom to breathe. Looking over her tormentor she's able to appreciate the change from their first encounter. Valerie now sports a pair of too small denim shorts that look more like a belt than proper covering for her massive rear and tree trunk legs. The white halter top accompanying her shorts is clearly not made for a woman of her size, leaving almost her entire belly exposed whilst her chest strains the fabric to transparency. Her flabby right arm is curled up towards her shoulder, hand clutching the top of a big brown sack carried against her back. The briefest glance past the gigantic blonde shows the vault all but empty, every ounce of profit she could gain already taken and stored in that sack. With a smirk everpresent on her chubby face Valerie steps towards Batgirl, leaving the vault entrance at her back. Rather than escape outright she looms large over the startled heroine, bending forward until they're face to face, the view of Valeries immense cleavage drawing Batgirls eye only for a second.

"Aren't you going to try and stop me?"
0211212211111.title: Fear Factor

0212.content: I’ll leave a few options open for anyone who might want to do another storyline.
0212.title: Citizen

02121.content:
After preventing what should have been a simple mugging, a very tired Batgirl stood atop a rooftop listening for the next crime to intercept. Ever since the vast majority of Gotham had been mysteriously fattened, criminals didn’t go down nearly as easy. She found herself spending more time and energy fighting each individual, due to their increased padding and weight they threw around. She had been forced to change things up drastically. Her focus now had to be on each individual, for fear of being overwhelmed by the sheer mass of multiple people. One mistake and she could be crushed under the fat of some criminal, and then who knows what. She was soon pulled out of her thoughts by the sound of breaking glass. Looking into the alley behind the building she was on top of, Batgirl saw the glass broken out of a door and the door slightly ajar.

Wasting no time, she shook off her tiredness, and made her way down to the alley below. Being as quiet as possible, Batgirl slipped inside the building, finding herself in near darkness. Walking along the dark hallway, she noticed none of the rooms had doors, just open doorways. That made things a little easier, since she didn’t have to worry about alerting the perpetrator with the sound of a door opening. Nearing the end of the hall, she finally saw the lights on in one of the rooms. Batgirl peered around the doorframe into the room, but it was empty, except for some papers on a desk by the wall. She made her way to the papers and began flipping through them, looking for some clue as to what the intruder may be after. 054221.content:
Officer Bullock trudged out of the police car and into the marsh, loathing every minute of it. He was one of GCPD’s finest, yet here he was in a swamp, trudging through the muck on a missing persons case. He needed a drink. Maybe he should consider a vacation?

Several people had gone missing in the area a few weeks prior, and of course it was just his luck he’d end up assigned to the case. He sighed as he waved his flashlight around, looking for evidence as he traipsed through the muck.

He searched for several minutes looking for anything; torn clothing, wallets, bones, but ultimately no luck. To be fair, he wasn’t trying too hard. Being in the dark, and being in a swamp, weren’t exactly his ideal locations on a Friday night. Still, he was being paid for this. He continued his half-assed search for a while longer, yawned, and decided it was getting late. Might as well head on and say he found nothing. Might go to a bar, if the commish’ laid into him about how short his patrol was.

As he made his way back to the police car, he suddenly heard something splashing behind him. Spinning around, he shined his light onto the surrounding marsh. He saw nothing, but felt uneasy, like he was being watched. He took a few more steps to the car, and heard more splashing. “Hello?” He nervously yelled, still not finding anything. “A-Anyone there?” silence was the only response. He gulped and backed away toward the car, still waving his flashlight around, looking for some kind of stalker. In Gotham, you never knew what sorts of crazies were out there, human or not.

Bullock was hoping this was Justin his head, nothing was really following him out there, but couldn’t shake the feeling that he was being followed. As he moved, he suddenly heard a large amount of splashing and froze. Shakily, he shined the light in the direction of the noise, terrified of what he might see. To his surprise, he saw… a possum. Rolling around in a puddle of mud a few feet in front of him.

As it caught the light, the animal looked at him, before bounding into the woodland. Harvey sighed in relief. He’d really let himself get spooked by a dumb animal, didn’t he? He felt like an idiot. “I need to switch to decaf…” He groaned, rubbing his shoulders, immediately feeling less nervous, “It just keeps getting me amped up, doesn’t it? Damn, Harv, a stupid possum...” He relaxed his shoulders and stretched, before looking at his watch. His bar should still be open at this hour. He could use a drink, someplace warm, and dry, and didn’t smell so disgusting. The place seemed to smell worse since he arrived. Huffing, he turned and made his way back to the police car.

He didn’t make it. He suddenly ran into something big. Big, scaly, wet, sticky, and… jiggly? He fell backwards into the swamp water. Groaning, he pulled his arms out of the muck, now his entire suit was soaked, and stunk like the rest of the swamp. He huffed, “Hey buddy, what’s the big idea?!” He snapped at the large figure looming over him, before realizing that might be a bad idea. The humanoid shape completely dwarfed him. He didn’t need his flashlight to see that it was huge… and fat. The silhouette of a big, protruding gut shown clear in the moonlit swamp. Harvey already had a few guesses as to who this was, but nervously drew up his flashlight anyway, shining it into the toothy, crocodile grin of one Waylon Jones. AKA…

“Killer Croc…” Harvey grumbled, mentally cursing to himself. Just his luck he’d have literally ran into one of the biggest, meanest atavistic psychopaths in Gotham. And ‘biggest’ he most certainly was now, Harvey observed, noting the GARGATUAN belly on Croc. It was massive. Harvey himself was a pretty fat guy, but Croc made him look like a twig in comparison. He was really beginning to regret yelling at him earlier. Harvey chuckled nervously, “Uh… Hiya Croc, how’s it been?” Croc just glared down at Harvey and crossed his arms, snorting indignantly. He gulped, “Uhh… Not in the mood for small talk, eh? Well… You certainly look… different…” Croc suddenly smiled at this. “Uh… Bigger, actually…”

Croc started to chuckle, then laugh at the top of his lungs. Harvey hesitantly chuckled too, hoping to get him into a less murderous mood. “I’m glad ya noticed” Croc growled out, smiling wide and dangerously, as he slapped his big belly and shook, “I’ve gained a few pounds.” ‘A few?’, Harvey thought, but didn’t want to provoke Croc further. He must’ve put on at least 200 more pounds of fat since he last saw him. Croc rubbed his belly, which let out a gurgle, “Been eating good, y’know?” Harvey’s mind suddenly turned to the missing person’s case on hand, and a chill shot up his spine, as he began to think where those people had gone, and where he might end up next, as he watched Croc’s big, fat body jiggle as he shook his gut.

Croc bent down and grabbed him by the scruff of his collar, and pulled him out of the much, effortlessly hoisting him in the air. He really didn’t want to be this blobby Croc’s next meal, but there was something about him. He seemed more ‘playful’ than hungry. “Ugh-Croc, I think if you were gonna kill me, you’d have already done it by now.” Harvey grunted as Croc held him a few inches in front of his face. “Oh? Did Gotham’s finest detective figure that out on his own?” Croc laughed.

He wasn’t in the mood for killing, so what did he want? “Remember last time you locked me up, Harv?” Croc suddenly said maliciously, “Called me a ‘disgusting freak’, a ‘mutant’… Said I oughtta stay in the sewer Batman found me in.” That did ring a bell to him, and Harvey shuddered, “Well, I decided that you might have a point...” Harvey was about to ask what Croc was getting at, before Croc raised his arm, and he was suddenly forced face-first into Croc’s sweaty, musky pit. “I am pretty disgusting, I’ll give ya that! It takes only a few moments for him to locate her office window, rappelling down with his grappling hook tied around the chimney and activating a small gadget on his belt to deactivate the mechanical locks. The window slides open with the simple press of his fingertips against the glass and the caped crusader slips inside the opulent mansion. The only light available comes from the crack at the foot of the closed door to the hallway, leaving little to aid Batman in surveying his surroundings. The office has a second door behind Eleanor's desk, seemingly leading to another room off the main hallway whilst a pair of two seater sofa's are placed to fill the floor of the spacious office. One directly opposite the desk whilst the other is perpendicular to it's right side, leaving only a couple of yards space between it's back and the windowed wall Batman just slipped through. The muttering of the two patrolling guards on the ground level below the window gives Batman little time to react, reaching out to activate the retraction on his grappling hook and seeing it speed up the side of the building and onto the roof, no doubt colliding with the chimney as it fully retracts to the tied cable. Closing the window carefully his infiltration is completed without a hitch, though now the Bat finds himself with a limited number of escape options.

Working attentively, Batman lets speed make way in the name of certainty as he begins shifting through the various stacks of paperwork on Eleanor's desk. Each appears to be listing the various acquisitions from her multiple business ventures since arriving in the city, one for each of the more renowned citizens he'd seen her mingling with at the Gala. The diamond jewelers had freely signed away nearly seventy percent ownership to her, as was the case with the sulfur market tycoon. The click of the lamp activating was almost drowned out by the door swinging shut on it's own weight in the same breath, the shadow of the huge office desk Batman's only way of going undiscovered now. "Well let's lay out the issues we've got here. For starters, Ms Chapman has a controlling interest in Wayne Enterprises now and therefore technically owns Wayne Manor. She and her associates are all unnaturally strong huge women with few inhibitions. Ms Chapman knows about the Batcave and my identity which rules out legal methods as she could make that public at any time. She seems to have a soft spot for me, but one of her associates does too and is playing a very dangerous game for both of us if her boss discovers it. Am I missing anything?"

They discussed the vagaries and particulars of the situation and the goal of it all was clear: Bruce needed to get the controlling stock back or at least out of Eleanor's control and into that of a more friendly party and this needed to be accomplished without Eleanor spreading the word about Batman. Sometime later Batman came to on a hard bench in a locker room. The first thing he noticed when he woke up was a massive weight crushing his aching body. Looking up through bleary eyes he could see there was an enormous man sitting on him. The man was bald with a goatee and was wearing a suit. He was already struggling desperately to breathe and the man knew it. The man wiggled around slightly while smiling at the beaten Bat.
