14411.content:
(Thanks to demonboy328 for helping with the grammar and parts of the story.)

It was a hard fight but Batman finally won. He had just finished taking down a trio of thugs robbing a store. It shouldn't have been too hard, but he wasn't aware of the third man. He took a bit of a beating, but they were now tied up for the police. Now that that was over he was limping through an alley, to call for the Batmobile. As he stumbled around the corner, he ran headfirst into something big and soft. As he took a step back, he was relieved to see it was just a group of kids. Though for Gotham, that wasn't always a good thing. There were about 8 of the boys, all around 14 years old. And just like the rest of Gotham, they were all big and fat. They all had to be at least 5'8" and 300+ pounds each. The minute the boys saw Batman, they all got excited.

Jack: “Damn guys check it out, it's Batman! What's up Bats, how about you meet our gang. I'm Jack and these guys are Joey, Todd, Luke, Ryan, Adam, Sam, and Nick.

Ryan: "We've always wanted to beat up the famous Batman. Looks like it's our lucky day."

Batman: "You kids get out of here. I may be beat up, but you're making a mistake picking a fight with me. Now move out of the way."

Batman attempted to push past the fat boys but it didn't go well. Jack was just waiting for Batman to make a move toward them, and he took his shot. Jack grabbed the injured hero by the arm and violently threw him across the alley, sending him crashing into the side of a dumpster. He then walked over and grabbed Batman by the cape and stood him back up. Using the cape, he threw the hero across the alley again. This time he crashed into the alley wall and bounced off, and fell hard onto the ground. The other boys watched excitedly as their buddy tossed the Batman around so easily. Jack walked over to the fallen hero on the ground, and pulled him up again.

Jack: "You still think we're making a mistake Bats? I don't think so, how about we ask Ryan."

Ryan took over with Batman, holding him tightly by his throat. With his throat held in one hand, Ryan drew back his fist and threw a powerful punch. His meaty fist sank deep into the hero's stomach, instantly knocking the wind out of him. Batman gasped out and fell to his knees holding his aching stomach. He was still trying to get his breath back when Ryan pulled him up to his feet. Once he was up, Batman was put into a tight headlock, with his face shoved into the boy's fat body. As he was held in the headlock, Ryan started throwing hard punches into the hero's stomach. After several blows, he finally let go of the headlock and let Batman drop to the ground.

Joey: "Come on and get up Bats, we ain't done with you yet! Its my turn to beat on you."

Joey lifted Batman up to his feet by his cape and put him in a bear hug. Him and the other boys laughed as he held Batman up off the ground. They all cheered when they watched the fat boy violently slam the hero onto the ground. There was a loud thump followed by him writhing around in pain. Joey wasn't done though, and he lifted Batman up once again. He repeated the move, hugging him and then slamming him to the ground again. Joey reached down and pulled him up to his feet again. This time however, he grabbed him around the neck like he was choking him. He then lifted the hero straight up by the throat, and slammed him to the ground hard.

Sam: "What's wrong Bats, you look hurt. I bet you didn't think we'd kick your ass so easy. Don't worry I won't be beating on you though."

Without any warning, Sam dropped his fat ass on top of Batman. His head completely disappeared under the massive ass, as the boy started smothering him. He tried desperately to knock the fat boy off but it was no use. The gang could hear muffled grunts coming from the hero as he struggled under the massive ass of the boy. After sitting on Batman for a few minutes Sam grabbed his head and pulled it up between his thick fat thighs. He started squeezing his thighs together tightly, causing Batman to yell into the fat covering his face. He kept this up until he was sure he would crush his skull, then finally stood up.

Nick: "That looked like it hurt Bats. Don't worry though you're halfway done. Just 4 of us left to go. Haha!"

144111.content:
As Batman staggered to his feet, he didn't even see Nick's fist coming at him. It seemingly came out of nowhere and slammed hard into his stomach, knocking the wind out of him once again. He knew it was a bad idea, but the beaten hero made a desperate attempt to stagger away from the group of obese teens. He got about three feet away, when he felt eight meaty hands grab onto him. Like he thought, a bad idea. The four teens roughly threw the hero against the wall, and threw several punches each into his already aching stomach. He doubled over in pain, but they quickly grabbed him and stood him back up. Batman was gasping for air, barely able to breath and could only stare forward at the teen's angry fat faces.

"Now that was really stupid of you Bats," yelled Nick. "Hold him for me boys!"

Luke and Adam each grabbed an arm of the hero, while Todd watched on with the original four teens, and Nick walked towards Batman. The look of anger on the teen's face was actually intimidating the Dark Knight. He wasn't sure what the fat teen was planning, but he was sure it wasn't going to be pleasant.

"You deserve everything you're about to get you piece of shit!" Nick yelled, as he threw a punch at Batman.

The first punch landed hard against Batman's chest, luckily the wild punch missed his chin by a wide margin. The second hit was equally as powerful, and rocketed right into his aching stomach. The hero started to buckle forward, but Luke and Adam jerked him back up, and right into another punch. The meaty fist connected with his left cheek, then his right was hit, followed by a few more hard punches aimed at his ribs. Another solid punch hit him square in the mouth, and one to his left eye. After the assault on his face, Batman was treated to a barrage of heavy blows to the stomach. The beaten hero was gasping for breath, and was starting to get dizzy, but he wasn't out of the woods yet. Nick proceeded to beat on the Dark Knight's face for several minutes, before he finally stopped, sweating and out of breath. At this point, Batman was barely conscious, and could hardly catch his breath. He could feel blood trickling down his face, beneath his mask, from both his nose and mouth. Luckily, it was finally over, or at least that's what he thought.

"So Bats, have you had enough?" huffed a tired Nick.

"......." Batman simply glared at the fat teen before him. He wasn't going to give the boy the satisfaction, even if he was in a huge amount of pain

"Not going to talk, huh?" Nick asked. "That's fine with me. You guys want a shot at the Batman?"

"Hell yeah!" shouted Adam.

"I want a shot too!" yelled Luke.

"Yeah, let me at that bitch!" spat Todd.

Nick stepped aside, and watched as Todd stepped up. Batman was acting tough, but he wasn't sure how much more he could take. Unfortunately, it looked like he was about to find out.

"I've always wanted to do this, Bats!" Todd said, kicking Batman hard in the stomach. "Don't let him fall over yet guys!"

"Don't worry, we've got this loser," laughed Luke and Adam.

Todd wasted no time, and started swinging at the hero immediately. The first punch hit Batman's already injured nose, causing it to start bleeding again. A quick shot to his mouth, and then the focus was back on his ribs. He pounded on the aching ribs over and over for several minutes, then he just stopped abruptly.

"Who's turn now?" Todd asked nonchalantly.

"Mine!" Adam shouted, letting go of one of Batman's arms.

No longer stable, Batman started to fall over, but Todd quickly took over, and held the hero up. Adam was even quicker than Todd. A few hits to the face, a few to the tortured ribs, and another one to the still bleeding nose. He still hurt like hell, but Batman believed he was almost done. Just one more teen to go and hopefully it would be over. Luke was easily the biggest of the bunch, and clearly the strongest. So, it was somewhat lucky that he only hit Batman a few times. Not lucky however, was that he was the one that finally broke the Dark Knight's nose. The huge, meaty fist seemed to go in slow motion, as it collided with his already damaged nose. Batman heard the sickening crunch, and he knew it was broken. That got a big reaction from the group of obese teens, as they all began laughing and high-fiving each other. The flabby arms that had been holding him up finally let go, and Batman collapsed onto the hard ground. The pain was excruciating, and everywhere, making it impossible to concentrate on just one area. Luckily, it was finally over, he had made it through the teen's vicious beating.

That's when the a huge foot came crashing down onto his ribs, followed quickly by another, and another. Batman covered his face, trying to at least protect his already broken nose from further damage. The teens continued stomping all over his body, not sparing an inch. Just when he thought he was finally going to pass out, the stomping stopped. Batman slowly began to force his broken body to stand, finally managing, though on shaky legs. As soon as he turned around to face his attackers, a huge foot flew forward, and collided with his crotch. There was no time to brace himself, it was just too quick. Once again, the once great hero of Gotham collapsed to the ground, gasping in pain and clutching his crotch.

All four of the girls stared at him for a second, then burst out laughing. Without warning the third girl, Lindsey, suddenly threw a vicious punch directly into Batman's crotch. His eyes rolled back in his head, and he let out a loud grunt in pain.

''That was so damn cool,'' Lindsey laughed. "I just punched the Batman in his dick! You all wanted to do that too right?"

"Yeah Batman, we feel the same as Lindsey," the fourth girl, Kristin said. "We're tired of listening to all you adults preaching at us. It's time to take that frustration out on someone. Besides, it's not everyday you get to have your way with Batman."

"You got that right girls," Jessica said. "Now, I wonder what we should do with you Batman? We could always keep doing what we are now. Or maybe we, can use you in our practice somehow."

Without waiting for his response, Batman was once again crushed under the immense weight of Jessica's massive ass. He was forced to suffer under her, as they discussed his fate.
153311.title: Taken to School

1533111.content:

Batman didn't expect the girls to move so fast and was barely able to catch his breath before their combined 500+ pounds slammed into him. The huge weight was already affecting him and he wasn't sure how long he would last if more was added.

Megan nodded and then the two girls jumped onto the back of the others. Batman saw them jump and he was instantly worried about the pain he was going to be in. It seemed like slow motion as he watched another 500+ pounds of fat falling onto him. The air was instantly forced out of his lungs and he was under tremendous pressure. He could feel his ribs straining under their combined 1000+ pounds of fat. The pain was excruciating but he tried his best not to let it show. He was being smothered to the point that he was unable to draw air into his lungs. The weight was already intense but got even worse when the girls started bouncing. He couldn't handle much more of their crushing. Just when he thought he would pass out from lack of air he got a bit of relief. He was able to get a breath in but it was short lived. Lindsey and Megan had gotten off for a second but he was smashed again when the two girls jumped back onto the others. The crushing was even harder this time and they heard a loud crack. All four girls got up and off of Batman to see what happened. When they looked down at the hero he was groaning in pain and holding his ribs. The girls just stood there watching him for a moment and then they all burst out laughing.

Megan: "Oh my god we broke one of his ribs! How awesome are we?"

Jessica: "Wow Batman you really suck. You got a rib broke by us freshman cheerleaders. Pathetic!"

154.title: Multiple Heroines

info.brief_description: Batman is at the mercy of a Gotham City populated by fat people. Now with Size Changing/TF
info.description:
The basic idea of this story is that Batman is in a Gotham City where most of, if not all of the population is fat. Of course that means all his villains are all fat as well. He is his regular size, making him much smaller than all the fat people around him. What I'm looking for in this interactive is fat villains, thugs, allies or even ordinary citizens dominating Batman in various ways. Any kind of domination you can think of is probably allowed. As far as citizens go, it can be anything including cops, politicians, ordinary people, students, anything.

It can be F/m, M/m, FM/m, Multiple Men&Women/m, F/f, M/f, FM/f or whatever you prefer.

Allowed: Facesitting, smothering, trampling, foot/ass worship, wrestling, beating him up, futanari/shemale, scat, belching, farting, forced sex, and slobs. Shrinking, giantess, and transforming are now allowed. If there is a fetish that you are interested in using, let me know.

Stuff to Avoid: Hardcore/graphic vore and killing off Batman or whoever is the focus of the story.

As far as other heroes go, the story is based on Batman and Gotham City. So, any other heroes should be either members of the Bat-Family, or those who operate within Gotham City. Some of the possible heroes are Black Canary, Huntress, Batwoman, and Zatanna, just to name a few. If you can think of anyone you want to use, but you're not sure, just let me know. OCs are also allowed.

Please try to avoid 1 sentence chapters if possible, unless its a choice chapter. Please only add a choice chapter if you plan on adding on to it. I've had a problem where people come and add a dozen choice chapters, with no actual content. I'm not a great writer myself, but I can proofread chapters if you're interested, just let me know. Any new chapters will receive gift points. So, have fun writing and if there are any questions, please send me a message. Also, rate and review if you would like, I'd love to know what you think.

UPDATE 11/3/19: Hey everyone, just wanted to post a quick update, since it’s been quite a while since the last. Just a reminder about someone else being the main focus of the story, other than Batman, I’ve added the option to focus on someone else instead. In that thread, you can make any of the heroes or supporting characters located in Gotham the focus of the story. So, for example, if you wanted Batgirl to be the one being dominated by fat people, that's perfectly fine. The link to this section will be in the first chapter.
Also, the story hasn’t been updated in a few months, and I know that kind of sucks. I haven’t been able to add much myself, due to lack of free time and lack of ideas. However, hopefully I’ll have something up relatively soon. Until then, I’m going to be giving GP for each chapter added. I’d really love to see more additions. As always, thank you for reading and adding, and have fun!
